column5: Hey guys, First post on this forum. I'm looking for some basic info for a fall fishing trip.... Has anyone stayed at Sandy Acres resort on Elephant Lake?  I'm just wondering what the cabins are like and how the resort is in general.  Also if anyone would suggest fishing Baptiste over Elephant for fall pike and bass. Thanks!

Welcome to the Board. I haven't stayed there, but the last time I saw them, the cabins looked okay. They are two completely different lakes and both are good at times. I think Baptiste doesn't suffer from the pressure that Elephant faces. Baptiste is bigger and deeper. I always enjoyed fishing those lakes! Haven't been in a few years now.
Thanks for the info, any info is appreciated!
It's been some years but I used to fish Baptiste quite a bit.  Live frogs, even frog imitations worked well on bass.
I always used to stay at Birchcliff lodge on Baptiste. A little pricey, $190 a night I think now.  Air BnBs are another option
pm me your email if you want a depth map of Baptiste
